nodes.text: Urce was an astronomical object located in the regions known as the Mid Rim and the New Territories. It was also situated in the grid square L-6 of the Standard Galactic Grid. Urce shared its name with the Urce sector.

Urce was first depicted in the new Star Wars canon on a galactic map in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a 2016 Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars Roleplaying boxed set. The planet Urce was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
